name: Moscone (George R.) Elementary
description: School Type: Early Education, Elementary School Serves grades: PreK, TK, K, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5 Uniform Policy: White collared shirt or blouse, navy blue pants, skirt, or jumper. School Meals: Breakfast, Lunch, After School Supper George R. Moscone Elementary School, located in the historic Mission District, has a multi-ethnic student body rich in cultural and linguistic diversity.
